title: Guarding Coherence

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: He's not guarding purity. Or originality. He's guarding coherence. A working model.
dialogue.context: While plucking flower petals, the AI clarifies what Evan truly protects

scene_context: A 2-panel scene showing the Architect pulling petals from a flower while explaining that self-protection is about maintaining functional coherence, not purity.
philosophical_theme: Identity as functional coherence rather than essential purity
visual_elements: The AI delicately removing flower petals one by one
